author: Teacher Peo Long
announcement: Dear students, we are going to have a an online meeting at 6pm on 30/08/2024. Noted that lesson 4 is not finished yet, please prepare your homework and classwork materials for a smooth online learning

author: Prof. Maria Gonzalez
announcement: Reminder: Our next class will focus on basic vocabulary and phrases. Please review the vocabulary list provided in the last session and complete the practice exercises before 02/09/2024.

author: Mme. Claire Dubois
announcement: Don't forget our role-playing activity scheduled for 03/09/2024. Prepare your dialogues and practice pronunciation. The session will be held at 4pm in Room 205.

author: Herr Johann Schmidt
announcement: We will have a quiz on complex sentence structures in the next class on 04/09/2024. Please review the grammar rules discussed and complete the exercises from the textbook.

author: Dr. Li Wei
announcement: Our next lecture on 05/09/2024 will cover Chinese idioms and their cultural significance. Make sure to read the assigned chapters and come prepared with any questions.
